description:
Using the latest weight tracking technology, the Everfit Weighing Scale features a large LCD viewing screen to track your weight fast and accurately with minimum hassle. And it is so easy to use. Step on to activate the scale and step off to switch it off automatically. Toggle between kilograms, pounds or stones conveniently with just one touch of a button at the back. Plus, its ultra slim design, high capacity of up to 180kg and 6mm tempered glass safety platform makes for durable use and hassle-free storage. Not least, the anti-slip base ensures the scale is always stable with every use.

Features
*Ultra slim design
*Weigh tracker
*Large LCD viewing screen
*Auto step on and off function
*6mm tempered safety glass platform
*Maximum 180kg capacity
*Anti-slip base
*Replaceable battery powered
*Low battery and overload indication

Specifications
*Dimensions: 280 x 280 x 20mm
*LCD size: 73mm x 28mm
*Capacity: 3kg/6lbs - 180kg/396lbs
*Tempered glass thickness: 6mm
*User selectable units: kg/lb/st
*Graduation: 0.1kg
*Low battery indicator ? Lo
*Overload indicator ?Err
*Weight: 1.5kg
*Colour: Black

Package Contents
Everfit Body fat scale x1
Lithium Battery x1

This product comes with 1 year warranty
name: Everfit 1EA
